metadata.name: Horsemen of the Apocalypse
metadata.description:
Created in 2012, this work has become an unexpected foretelling of various dramatic life-changing circumstances: the Ukrainian revolution of 2013, the Coronavirus pandemic, the war in Donbass from 2014-2022 and the Russian invasion of 2022. Our world is on the brink of tremendous changes. Perhaps there will be even more events to come. The Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse are on their way...

2012-2022, Digitalized painting, 10143 x 6308 dpi
